name: 12 Items or Fewer
description:
You're the new checkout manager of a quiet suburban supermarket. Keep your customers moving and your staff well-rested, and Corporate will be happy.

12 Items or Fewer is a zen management game. It's about watching queues flow and numbers tick up. Every game has a new randomly generated team to manage.

Sound effects from FreeSound users se2001, Zott820 and rhodesmas.
